Square: Developer Platform Engineers (frontend, server, and mobile) | ONSITE: San Francisco | VISA

Note: other teams are hiring but I'm posting for my particular team: Developer Platform.

- Really need another frontend engineer. Grew by several backend and mobile engineers since last month

- Help us (tiny team, will grow and add responsibility) build the product and infrastructure for millions of merchants.

- APIs and SDKs for eCommerce and the Register point of sale

- Make it easy, scalable, and consistent to expose Square's products to external developers

- App Marketplace

- Architecture, availability, growth, and scalability of all public APIs

- Mobile and Server side areas of focus

- Junior and more Senior people welcome to apply Lear more and apply (mention 'hacker news') http://bit.ly/1QCMw6Y

Or ping me on twitter @jawspeak (thanks everyone who did last month - you all should have heard back from the recruiters).
